h2_title: Where to use the Proto-Amourworm in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Proto-Amourworm can be given to Chen Loong in The New West's Zodiac Realm after you have defeated him and given him the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet. Upon giving this to him, you can rest at a Shrine and find three baskets next to him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Proto-Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Proto-Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Proto-Amourworm in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Proto-Amourworm can be given to Chen Loong in The New West's Zodiac Realm after you have defeated him and given him the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet. Upon giving this to him, you can rest at a Shrine and find three baskets next to him.
